snippet.title: KIT - SCC - Dienste - Software & Anwendungen - Technisch-Wissenschaftliche Anwendungen - Unterprogrammbibliotheken - Beschreibung der einzelnen Routinen - BLAS
snippet.description: * KIT - SCC - Dienste - Software & Anwendungen - Technisch-Wissenschaftliche Anwendungen - Unterprogrammbibliotheken - Beschreibung der einzelnen Routinen - BLAS (clueweb12-1205wb-18-26974) http://www.scc.kit.edu/dienste/5767.php ...CCOPY Copy a vector X to a vector Y, both complex. CDOTC Compute the complex conjugate dot product, conjg(x)*y. CDOTU Compute the complex dot product x*y. CSCAL Multiply...rank-one matrix update: A = A + alpha*x*ctrans(y), where ctrans(y) is the conjugate transpose of the vector. CGERU Perform the rank-one matrix update: A = A + alpha*x*trans(y), where trans(y) is the transpose of the vector. CHBMV Perform the matrix-vector operation y = alpha*A*x + beta*y, where A is a Hermitian band matrix in band Hermitian storage. CHEMV Perform the matrix-vector multiplication y = alpha*A*x + beta*y, where A... [cached version]
